HTMLMediaElementEnded_event.summary: The ended event is fired when playback or streaming has stopped because the end of the media was reached or because no further data is available.

remarks.para: This event occurs based upon ({{HTMLElement("audio")}} and {{HTMLElement("video")}}) fire ended when playback reaches the end of the media.
This event is not cancelable and does not bubble.

-
-
-audio
-video
-Media Capture and Streams-Media Capture and Streams: ended event
-Web Audio API-Web audio API: ended event
